steps.name: Given  the user is logged in
When  the user clicks on 'Project Button' <Kids> at 'Project Component'
And  the user hovers on "Get Item" <Lunch> at 'Items Component'
And  the user clicks on "Item Contextmenu" <Lunch> on "Add item above" option at "Items Component"
Then  the user enters "Breakfast" and saves it
And  the "Breakfast" should be added above the "Lunch"
